231521.「命の声に 満ちているの。\n それに 光も……。:
It's filled with the voice of life. And the
light...

231523.「闇の中で あなたは 私を照らしだした。: In the darkness, you illuminated me.

231531.「……この者は いまだ\n 自分の名前以外 思いだせぬようだ。:
She still can't seem to remember anything
other than her name.

231533.「この地で しばし 保護していたが\n 依然 その正体は わからぬまま。:
We have been protecting her here for some
time, but her true identity remains unknown.

231535.「だが……\n ひとつだけ わかっていることがある。: But I do know one thing.

231537.「イルーシャが 結晶より現れた時……\n そなたの体内の 魔瘴を 取り除いたであ:
When Irusha emerged from the crystal, she
removed the demon miasma from your body. She
possesses the power to control it.

231539.「……魔瘴を止める方法とは そのことだ。\n そなたには イルーシャと共に 魔界:
That is how we will stop the demon miasma. I
want you to travel around the Demon World with
Irusha and contain the miasmounds.

231541.「……イルーシャは そなたと 一緒ならば\n 引き受けると言うのでな。なぜか こ:
Irusha said she only would accept if you went
with her. For some reason, she seems to be
very attached to you.

231543.「魔瘴塚がある地は…… ジャリムバハ砂漠\n ゲルヘナ幻野 ベルヴァインの森の３:
There are three places where miasmounds were found: Jyarimbaha Desert, Gerhena Field, and Belvain Forest. It doesn't matter which one
you start with.

231545.「３つの魔瘴塚の封印に 成功したら\n ふたたび 我のもとに来るがよい。頼んだぞ:
When you succeed in sealing the three
miasmounds, come back to see me. I'm
counting on you.

231547.「ぼくは こちらで 待っております！\n イルーシャさん いってらっしゃいませ！:
I'll be waiting right here! Have a safe trip,
Ms. Irusha!

231555.「…………見えたのね？: You... you saw it, didn't you?

231559.「……さあ 次の場所に 行きましょう。: ...Now let's go to the next place.

231561.「……さあ ３つ 終わったから\n 魔仙卿のところに 戻りましょう。:
Now that all three are done, let's go back to
the Oracle.

231563.「……日に日に 魔瘴が活性化してるようです。\n いよいよ 大魔瘴期も近いってこ:
...It seems that demon miasma is becoming more
active with each passing day. I wonder if this
means that the Age of Miasma is finally near.

231565.「そんで 亡国ゴーラの近くに位置する\n 我ら バルディスタが\n いちばん 危:
And being so close to the dead nation of Gora,
Valdista is in the greatest danger.

231567.「……いまいましい。\n 大魔王選定の儀などという くだらぬ茶番で\n 無駄な時:
...How annoying. I can't believe I wasted my
time on a farce like the Great Demon King
selection ceremony.

231571.「……やめろ。\n かまっている時間も 惜しい。: ...No. We don't have time for this.

231573.「見かけないカオがあるな。: There's a face I haven't seen.

231577.「さあ 国に帰り\n アストルティアへの侵攻準備を 再開するぞ。\n 我らには:
We must return and resume preparations for the
invasion of Astoltia. We cannot afford to
waste any more time.

231583.「……さあ 次の場所に 行きましょう。: ...Now let's go to the next place.

231585.「……さあ ３つ 終わったから\n 魔仙卿のところに 戻りましょう。:
Now that all three are done, let's go back to
the Oracle.

231587.「なんだ 貴様らは！ なぜ ここにいる！\n さっさと 立ち去らないと 痛い目を:
Who the hell are you!? Why are you here!? Get
out right now if you don't wanna get hurt!

231589.「……これこれ そう居丈高に 言うでない。\n 旅の方が おどろかれているであろ:
...Now, now, no need to be so aggressive.
You're startling these travelers.

231591.「ここは 魔瘴が噴きだす 魔瘴塚です。\n 近づいたら 危ない。\n はやく 離:
This is a miasmound where demon miasma spews
out. It's dangerous to approach. You'd better
get away from it quickly.

231593.「……私なら 大丈夫。\n それを 止めにきたの。: I'll be fine. That's what I'm here to stop.

231599.「いやぁーっ！ すごいすごいっ！\n これは おどろきましたな！:
Oh my! Absolutely amazing! This is quite a
surprise!

231601.「……おっと！ 申し遅れましたな。\n ゼクレス魔導国の オジャロスという者です:
...Oh! Please pardon me. I am Ojalos of
Zechres. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.

231603.「このお方は エルガドーラ王太后様の弟君……\n オジャロス大公で あらせられる:
This is Grand Duke Ojalos, brother of the
Dowager Empress Elgadora! Show him the proper
respect, you lowborn demons!

231605.「領地内の魔瘴塚が 活性化しはじめたと聞いて\n 様子を 見にきていたのですが…:
I had heard that the miasmound in the area had
become active, so I came to check on it... but
thanks to you, I don't have to worry anymore!

231607.「それにしても…… 魔瘴をあやつるなんて\n すばらしいチカラですな！\n あの:
But still... it's amazing how you can control
demon miasma! I've never seen such a miracle
before!

231609.「大いなる闇の根源から 生まれし魔瘴と\n 近しい存在……あなたこそ まさに\n:
Able to approach and control miasma born of
the Great Source of Darkness... truly, you
deserve to be called a Maiden of Miasma!

231613.「おそれながら オジャロス様！\n そろそろ エルガドーラ様との\n 約束のお時:
With all due respect, Master Ojalos, you have
an appointment with Lady Elgadora...

231615.「おお そうであった。\n 姉上は 時間に厳しいからのう……。:
Oh, that's right. My sister is a stickler
when it comes to schedules...

231617.「キミたち 魔瘴塚を止めてくれて 助かった！\n ゼクレス魔導国を代表して 礼を:
Thank you for stopping the miasmound! On
behalf of Zechres, let me thank you. Now, if
you'll excuse me.

231619.「……さあ 次の場所に 行きましょう。: ...Now let's go to the next place.

231621.「……さあ ３つ 終わったから\n 魔仙卿のところに 戻りましょう。:
Now that all three are done, let's go back to
the Oracle.

231623.「……キキッ ミタゾ ミタゾ。: ...kee hee... I saw it, I saw it!

231625.「ほう……。\n 見慣れぬ客が 来たな。: Well... an unfamiliar guest has arrived.

231629.「お初に お目にかかります。\n 私は ゴーラの国の長老 ヌブロと申します。:
It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance. My
name is Elder Nubro from the land of Gora.

231631.「直接 そちらに お伺いできなかったゆえ……\n こうして お話しさせていただく:
Since I was not able to visit you in person,
please forgive me for speaking to you in this
way.

231635.「……魔幻都市ゴーラ。\n 先代大魔王 マデサゴーラの本拠であった地だ。:
...The phantom city of Gora. It was the home
of the previous Great Demon King, Madesagora.

231637.「だが……もとより 魔瘴の深き地だったゴーラは\n ある時 その大噴出によって:
...But Gora, which had always been thick with
demon miasma, was one day destroyed by a
massive outpouring of it.

231641.「ホッホッホッ おっしゃる通りです。\n ですが……少数の民は 難を逃れ\n 今:
Hohoho, it is as you say. But there are a few
of us who survived and still live in the land
of Gora.

231643.「……なんとも しぶといものだな。\n そのゴーラの長老の 用向きとなれば……？:
...You're quite resilient. And what business
does the elder of Gora have with me...?

231645.「かろうじて 生きのびた我々ですが……\n さらなる魔瘴の増加に 苦しんでおりま:
We have survived, true... but we are still
suffering because of the demon miasma here.

231647.「このままでは 遠からず\n ゴーラは 完全に 死の大地となり果てます。:
At this rate, perhaps very soon, Gora will be
completely transformed into a land of death.

231649.「そこで……\n そちらに いらっしゃる 魔瘴の巫女様。\n あなた様を ゴーラ:
So... my dear Maiden of Miasma. I would like
to invite you to come to Gora!

231653.「あなた様のおチカラは 邪眼樹を通して\n 拝見させていただきました……。:
I have seen your power through the Evil Eye
Tree...

231655.「イルーシャ様であれば……\n ゴーラの深き魔瘴をも 鎮められましょう。\n ど:
With you, Lady Irusha, we will be able to
subdue the pervasive demon miasma in Gora.
Will you not come to our aid?

231657.「しかし……かの地は 危険に過ぎる。\n イルーシャが行くには あまりにも……:
Those lands are far too dangerous... I cannot
allow Irusha to go...

231661.「私のチカラが 役に立つのなら。\n それに……何か 思いだせるかもしれない。:
My power can help. Besides... maybe it will
help me remember something.

231663.「<pc>と 一緒なら\n どんな危険な場所でも 平気よ。:
With <pc>, I can go anywhere
dangerous.

231665.「……ホッホッホッ。\n なんと ありがたき お言葉。:
...Hohoho. Thank you so much for your kind
words.

231667.「私どもは ゴーラにて お待ちしております。\n 道中は 魔瘴が深くなっておりま:
We will be waiting for you in Gora. Please be
careful on the way, as the demon miasma is
getting thicker and thicker...

231675.「……この先は 魔瘴が深いようだけれど\n 私が魔瘴を払うから 大丈夫よ。\n:
...There seems to be thick demon miasma
ahead, but I'll get rid of it, so you'll be
fine. Let's go see the Elder of Gora.

231677.「お待ちしておりました！\n 魔瘴の巫女様……そして 護衛のお方！\n どうか:
We've been expecting you! My dear Maiden of
Miasma... and her escort! Please help us!

231679.「巫女様が持つ ふしぎなおチカラで 我らを\n 魔瘴から 守ってくださると お聞:
We've heard that the wondrous power of the
Maiden can protect us from demon miasma!

231681.「おお……巫女様は\n なんと 慈悲深いのでしょう！\n ゴーラの民を お救いく:
Oh... how merciful the Maiden is! Please, save
the people of Gora!

231685.「これこれ。巫女様を こまらせるでない。: Now, now. Don't make the Maiden feel anxious.

231687.「改めまして…… ようこそ ゴーラへ。\n はるばる ご足労いただき 感謝します:
Once again, welcome to Gora. Thank you for
making the long trip.

231689.「ここは 大魔王マデサゴーラ様の城だった場所。\n 外は 魔瘴に満ちていたでしょ:
This was once the castle of the Great Demon
King Madesagora. The outside was filled with
miasma, wasn't it? We live here as a refuge.

231691.「……民が 興奮したようで すみませぬな。\n 長き間 魔瘴に苦しめられてきた\:
I'm sorry that the people have become so excited. We have been tormented by demon miasma for so long, and the Maiden of Miasma
is our only hope.

231693.「さて……本日は もう お疲れでしょう。\n おふたりのために 部屋を ご用意し:
Well... you must be tired today. We've
prepared a room for the two of you. Please,
this way...

231695.「よくぞ来た！ 魔瘴の巫女！: You've finally come, Maiden of Miasma!

231697.「オレ様の芸術で 歓迎してやろう！: I welcome you with some of my art!

231699.「……フン キマったな。\n オレ様の芸術に 目を奪われて\n 言葉も 出ないと:
...Hmph, it's obvious. You've become
speechless at the sight of my art.

231701.「これ！ 巫女様の前で なんと 無礼な！:
Hey! How dare you act so rude in front of the
Maiden!

231703.「こら！ マデサゴーラ様が遺された 城の壁に\n ラクガキするなと 何度言えば:
Hey! How many times have we told you not to
scribble on the walls of the castle Lord
Madesagora left to you!?

231707.「それに…… 貴様らのほうこそ 無礼者だろう！\n いったい オレ様を 誰だと思:
And besides... you're the ones who are being
rude! Who the hell do you think I am?

231709.「オレ様は 魔界の芸術に革命を起こす\n 不世出の芸術家…… ペペロゴーラ様だぞ:
I am Peperogora, the unparalleled artist who
will revolutionize the art of the Demon World!

231713.「……うわー 離せっ！ 無礼者！\n オレ様の 芸術的な髪型が乱れる！:
...Uwah, let go! You brutes! You're messing up
my artistic 'do!

231715.「くそっ…… わからず屋の 愚民どもめっ！\n 今に オレ様の芸術が いかに\n:
Damn... you, you philistines! One day, I'll
show you just how great my art really is!

231717.「……お見苦しいところを お見せしましたな。\n あのペペロゴーラは マデサゴー:
I'm sorry you had to see that. That was
Peperogora, grandson of Lord Madesagora, and
his only living relative...

231719.「これが 手のつけられない 問題児でして……\n 我らも皆 手を焼いておるのです:
He is an unruly problem child that we are all
having a hard time dealing with.

231721.「あの……私たちは 探しものがあって\n ここまで 来ました。:
Um... we came here because we were looking for
something.

231723.「……大魔王の覇印というものです。: ...It is called the Great Demon King Mark.

231725.「ふむ……？ 大魔王の覇印とな……。: Hmm...? The Great Demon King Mark...

231727.「確かに マデサゴーラ様が そのようなものを\n 持っていたと 記憶しております:
I do recall that Lord Madesagora had something
like that, but I honestly don't know where it
is.

231729.「大魔王の覇印については 情報を集めさせます。\n 今日は もう 休まれてはいか:
I will gather information on the Great Demon
King Mark. Why don't you rest for today? I
will let you know if I learn anything.

231731.「お部屋は あちらの大階段を のぼって\n 右手に 進んだところに ございます。:
The rooms are just over there, up the main
stairs and on your right. Come, Maiden, this
way, please...

231733.「……先に 部屋に行ってるわね。: ...I will go on ahead to the room.

231737.「……マデサゴーラじじいの\n アトリエに行くと 言ったな！:
...You said you were going to the old man's
studio!

231739.「ならば その案内役……このペペロゴーラ様が\n 引き受けようではないか！:
In that case... I, Peperogora, shall act as
your guide!

231741.「……何を バカなことを！\n お前などが 行っても\n 巫女様の 足手まといに:
...What foolishness! You'll only get in the
Maiden's way!

231743.「なぜだ！？ じじいのことなら\n オレ様が ゴーラの誰よりも 知っているぞ！:
Why? I knew the old man better than anyone in
all of Gora!

231745.「いいや ならん！\n おふたりは 遊びにいくわけではないのだ。:
I won't allow it! Those two aren't going on
some casual stroll!

231747.「だいたい お前にできることと言えば\n お絵かき程度のものではないか。\n そ:
Besides, the only thing you're even remotely
good at is scribbling. What use could you
possibly be to them?

231749.「なんだと！ お絵かきではない！\n オレ様は…… 芸術を……っ！:
What was that!? It's not scribbling! I'm...
making art!

231751.「……クソッ 石アタマめ！\n どいつも こいつも……わからず屋だッ！:
...Damn blockhead! I'm constantly
surrounded by philistines!

231755.「ふう…… またも お見苦しいところを……。:
Phew... again, I apologize for the
inconvenience...

231757.「ペペロは…… 幼き頃に 両親を失いまして。\n マデサゴーラ様に代わって\n:
Pepero lost his parents when he was very
young. I took care of him on behalf of
Lord Madesagora.

231759.「偉大な芸術家である 祖父の影響か\n 芸術を志すようになったのですが\n その:
He was inspired to pursue art by his
grandfather, who was himself a great artist,
but Lord Madesagora, too, sadly passed away...

231761.「あれも かわいそうな子なのです。\n それで きかん坊になっておるんですな。:
Poor thing. That's why he's always acting
like a brat.

231763.「おっと 話の途中でしたな。: Oh, sorry, we were discussing something else.

231765.「……近年 魔瘴が増えていると 話しましたな。\n その魔瘴が 発生していると思:
I told you that demon miasma has been increasing in recent years. We believe that demon miasma is coming from the lower part of
Gora, where the Demon Park is located.

231767.「魔幻園で 大魔王の覇印を 探されるのであれば\n そのついでで かまいませんの:
If you are going to search for the Great Demon King Mark in the Demon Park, would you mind investigating the cause of the outpouring of
miasma as well?

231769.「魔幻園は 今は 魔瘴に沈んでおり\n もともとあった道も 地形が変わってしまっ:
Because of the demon miasma, the landscape has
changed, and the original route to the Demon
Park can no longer be used.

231771.「現在 魔幻園へ行く手段は ただひとつ……\n マデサゴーラ様が 遺された 不思:
Currently, the only way to get to the Demon
Park is with the "Coffin to the Abyss," an
odd vehicle left behind by Lord Madesagora.

231773.「奈落へいざなう棺桶の 乗り場でしたら\n この宮殿を出て 十字路を 西に進んで:
If you are looking for the Coffin to the
Abyss, you can find it by leaving this palace
and going west on the crossroads.

231775.「おふたりとも……くれぐれも お気をつけて。\n よろしく 頼みましたぞ。:
Take care of yourselves, both of you. We are
counting on you.

231777.「フハハハハッ！\n 待っていたぞ 魔瘴の巫女！:
Hahahahaha! I've been waiting for you, Maiden
of Miasma!

231779.「あなたは…… ペペロゴーラくん？\n どうして ここに……: Are you... Peperogora? Why are you here?

231781.「フン！ 決まっているだろう。\n オレ様も 魔幻園に行きたいからだ！:
Hmph! It's obvious, isn't it? Because I want
to go to the Demon Park, too!

231783.「いいか？ ゴーラが壊滅する前に\n マデサゴーラのじじいが アトリエにこもって:
You listening? I heard that my old man was
holed up in his studio working on something
big before Gora was destroyed.

231785.「その作品は…… マデサゴーラ芸術を愛する\n 好事家たちの間で 幻の大作と呼ば:
And that something... is called the "Phantom
Masterpiece" by lovers of Madesagora's art. I
have to see it, no matter what!

231787.「……というわけだ！\n オレ様を じじいのアトリエに連れていけ！<yesno>:
...So there you have it! Take me with you to
the old man's studio! <yesno><close>

231789.「なんだか 放っておけないわ。\n 連れていってあげましょう？<yesno><c:
I don't think we should leave him alone. Won't
you take him with us? <yesno><close>

231793.「フハハハ！ さすがは 巫女と その護衛だ！\n じつに ものわかりがいいな！\:
Hahahaha! As expected of the Maiden and her
guard! You really do understand! You two can
be my henchmen!

231795.「そうと決まれば さっそく\n 魔幻園マデッサンスに 出発だ！:
With that settled, let's head to the Demon
Park, Madessaince!

231797.「フン……これが じじいが作った\n 奈落へいざなう棺桶か。魔幻園には\n 別の:
Hmm... so this is the Coffin to the Abyss that my old man made. This is my first time using it, since I always took a different route to
get to the park before.

231799.「……おい 巫女と その護衛。\n 何をしている！ はやく 乗れ！:
Hey, Maiden and guard. What are you waiting
for? Hurry up and get in!

231801.「……ペペロゴーラくん。巫女と 護衛じゃなくて\n ちゃんと 名前で呼んでね。\:
Peperogora. You should call us by name, not as
"Maiden" and "guard". I am Irusha. And this is
<pc>.

231803.「それに 巫女かどうかも わからないの。\n ……記憶がなくて おぼえていないか:
And I don't know if I'm a Maiden or not. I
don't remember anything.

231805.「フン…… 記憶がないクセに\n 巫女呼ばわりされるがままに なっているとは\n:
Hmph... you have no memories, and you allow
everyone to call you a Maiden... you have no
individuality!

231807.「そんな生き方は 芸術性に欠けるぞ。\n もっと 自分というものを 表現すべきだ:
That kind of life lacks artistry. You should
express yourself more... like me!

231811.「……なんだ？ 何が おかしい？\n オレ様を バカにしているなら……:
...What? What's so funny? If you're making fun
of me...

231815.「な…なんだ……この妙な乗り物は……。: Wh... what... is this strange vehicle...

231821.「はァはァ…… おそろしい乗り物だった。\n まったく じじいも 趣味が悪い。:
Hah, hah... what a horrible ride. Geez, the
old man's got bad taste.

231823.「そうかしら？\n 私 もう一度 乗ってみたい……。:
You think so? I'd like to try riding it
again...

231825.「……魔瘴が深いわ。\n ふたりとも……私から 離れないで。\n 気をつけて 進:
...The demon miasma is thick here. Stay close
to me, both of you. Let's proceed with care.

231827.「よしッ！ ここに\n じじいが描いた 幻の大作があるはず……。:
Yes! I'm sure my old man's Phantom Masterpiece
is here...

231829.「アトリエが…… な なんてことだ。\n 魔物のしわざなのか？\n 天井が 壊れ:
The studio... how could this have happened?
Was it a monster's doing? The ceiling's been
wrecked!

231839.「おお すごいぞ！\n これは 幻の大作のデッサンだ！:
Ohh, amazing! This is a sketch of the Phantom
Masterpiece!

231841.「……なるほど。魔法のカンバスの中に\n 生きた魔物たちを封じ込め それを絵とし:
...I see. So he was trying to contain living
monsters in a magical canvas and make a
painting out of it!

231843.「『ほとばしる命の狂宴』というのが\n 作品のタイトルか。ふむふむ……:
The title of the work is "The Mad Banquet of
Life"? Hmmm...

231845.「この絵の 制作ノートみたい。\n ……制作の過程が 書かれているわ。:
It's like a production notebook for this
painting... It describes the creation process.

231847.「……数百匹の魔物どもを 捕らえることにも\n 苦労したが…… 魔瘴竜の封印には:
...I've had a hard time capturing hundreds of
monsters, but I had the most trouble sealing
away the miasma dragon.

231849.「魔瘴竜を 絵の中に 封じ込めるには\n 余が創った 特殊な顔料を使って\n 目:
To contain it inside the painting, I had
to first weaken it by painting sigils on its
eyes using a special pigment I created...

231851.「……顔料？ それは じじいから拝借して\n オレ様が 使っている 顔料のことか:
Pigment? You mean the pigment I borrowed from
my old man?

231853.「この顔料に そんなチカラがあったとはな。: I didn't know this pigment had such power.

231855.「……そうして 絵の中に 竜を引きずり込み\n 特製のカンバスに 大魔王の覇印を:
...and then I dragged the dragon into the
painting and stamped the Great Demon King Mark
on a special canvas to seal it away...

231857.「……果たして\n 『ほとばしる命の狂宴』は完成した。:
At last, the "Mad Banquet of Life" is
completed.

231859.「だが……できあがった『狂宴』には\n 何かが 欠けている。\n 余が望んだもの:
But... something is missing from the resulting
"mad banquet". Is this what I wanted?

231861.「余は……生命のあがきを！ 苦悩を！ 葛藤を！\n 描きたかったのではないのか！:
The struggle for life! The anguish! The
conflict! That's what I wanted to depict!

231863.「……この絵は 失敗作だ。すててしまおう。:
...This painting is a failure. I'll throw it
away.

231865.「……だが 費やした時間は 無駄ではなかった。\n 本当に 生きた作品を 創る方:
...But the time I spent was not in vain. I
think I have found the answer to the question
of how to create a truly living work of art.

231867.「……幻の大作を作るのに\n 大魔王の覇印が 使われていたみたい。\n 手がかり:
It seems that the Great Demon King Mark was
used to create the Phantom Masterpiece. We
have found a clue.

231869.「幻の大作を……\n す…す……: The Phantom Masterpiece was... th... thro...

231871.「お…終わった……。\n オレ様の 芸術的人生は おしまいだ……。: I-it's over... My artistic career is over...

231875.「オレ様は…… ここのところ スランプでな。\n いくら 絵を描いても 描いても:
I've been in a slump for a while now... No
matter how many paintings I make, something
always seems to be missing.

231877.「だから じじいが没頭して 制作したという\n 幻の大作を見れば…… きっと オ:
I thought if I saw the Phantom Masterpiece my
old man put so much time into, it would help
awaken my inner artist... it had to!

231879.「そうすれば……\n ゴーラの愚民どもを 見返せるような\n 世紀の傑作が 創れ:
If I did that... then I could create the
masterpiece of the century and rub it in the
faces of all those fools in Gora!

231881.「オレ様は…… じじいみたいな\n すごい芸術家に なりたかった……。\n それ:
I... I wanted to be a great artist just like
my grandfather... so I painted so much
and worked so hard.

231883.「だが どれだけ 描いても……\n 誰にも 認めてもらえぬ。\n ただ ラクガキ:
But no matter how many times I painted... no
one would acknowledge it. They just make fun
of it and call it scribbles.

231885.「じじいと違って オレ様には\n 才能が ないのだ……。: Unlike my grandfather, I have no talent...

231889.「すてられた 幻の大作だって\n 見つかるかもしれないわ。\n あきらめないで:
We might still find the discarded Phantom
Masterpiece. Don't give up, let's look for it.

231891.「ぺ……ペペロくんだとぉ！？ \n そんなふうに 気安く 呼ぶとは\n いったい:
Pe... Pepero!? Who do you think you are to
call me that...?

231893.「……ああッ そうだッ！\n 思いだした！ この近くの谷に じじいが\n よく失:
...Ah, that's right! I remember now! My old
man used to throw away his trash in a valley
near here!

231895.「フハハハハ！ オレ様としたことが\n みっともないところを 見せたな！:
Hahahaha! I've shown you some unsightly
behavior just now!

231897.「じじいが 失敗作を すてていた谷……\n 芸術の墓場は このアトリエの地下にお:
The valley where the old man used to discard
his failures, the Cemetery of Art, is just
past the basement of this studio!

231903.「大魔王の覇印は 見当たらないようだけど……\n 今は 絵を探しに 芸術の墓場に:
We still haven't found the Great Demon King
Mark, but for now, let's go to the Cemetery of
Art to look for the painting.

231905.「……おおッ！ あれこそは\n じじいの 幻の大作ではないか？:
...Ohh! Is that my old man's Phantom
Masterpiece?

231907.「しかし 何も 描かれていないな。\n では 違うのか……。: But there's nothing on it. Then it's not...

231913.「ひ…ひええっ！\n 絵から…… 竜が飛びだしてきた……！:
E-eeeek! A dragon... a dragon jumped out of
the painting...!

231915.「マデサゴーラさんが\n 絵画に封じ込めたという魔瘴竜……。\n 魔瘴が増えてい:
The miasma dragon that Mr. Madesagora said he
sealed in the painting...so that must be the
cause of the increase in miasma.

231919.「よくも……我を 封印しおったなァァァ！: How dare you... seal me away!

231921.「……目に 封印の紋章が入ってる。\n でも 片目だけだわ。:
...A sigil in its eye. But it's only in one
eye.

231923.「もしかしたら もう片方にも 紋章を入れれば\n 魔瘴竜を 退治できるんじゃない:
Maybe if we put a sigil in the other one, we
can defeat it?

231927.「ムッ…ムリだ！ このオレ様に じじいと\n 同じことが できるはずがないだろう:
N-n-no way! There's no way I could do what my
old man did...!

231933.「それは……大魔王の覇印？\n この魔物が 飲み込んでいたのね。:
Is that... the Great Demon King Mark? The
monster must have swallowed it.

231935.「我を 封印した\n いまいましき 覇印がァ……。: The accursed mark that sealed me...

231953.「オレ様の才能をもってすれば\n これしき たやすいわ！ フハハハ……:
With my talent, this was a piece of cake!
Hahahaha...

231959.「これは……オレ様が 完成させた絵だ……！\n 絶対に はなさな……:
This is... a painting I completed...! I'll
never let it go...

231965.「今よ！ 絵画に 大魔王の覇印を！:
Now! Put the Great Demon King Mark on the
painting!

231967.「イルーシャ 貴様……すごいな！\n あんなにあった魔瘴が なくなってしまったぞ:
Irusha, you're amazing! All that demon miasma
is gone!

231969.「やけに 痛々しいが……大丈夫なのかッ？: That looks like it hurts... are you all right?

231971.「私は 平気……すぐに治るわ。それよりも……: I'm fine... it'll pass. More importantly...

231973.「……かっこいい。\n ペペロくんの 力作ね。: ...It's cool. This is your hard work, Pepero.

231979.「フ……フハハハハ！ オレ様の\n みなぎる芸術的才能が 炸裂したのだから\n:
H...hahahahaha! I'm bursting with artistic
talent, so it's only natural that I could do
something like this!

231981.「……よし！ さっそく この絵を持って帰り\n ゴーラの愚民どもに 見せてくれよ:
...Okay! Now to take this painting home and
show it to the fools of Gora! I'm sure they'll
be moved to tears!

231983.「オレ様は 先に 城へ戻っている！\n 貴様らも さっさと 来るがよいぞ！:
I'm going back to the castle! You better hurry
and get back there, too!

231985.「ペペロくん……元気が出たみたいね。\n よかったわ。:
Pepero... seems to be feeling better. I'm
glad.

231987.「さあ 私たちも 魔幻宮殿に帰りましょう。: Come on, let's go back to the Demon Palace.

231989.<cs_pchero>は\n大魔王の覇印（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me:
<cs_pchero> received
the Great Demon King Mark (Key Item)!<me 60>

231991.「これが マデサゴーラ様の 幻の大作……\n 『ほとばしる命の狂宴』を\n ペペ:
This is Lord Madesagora's Phantom Masterpiece,
"The Mad Banquet of Life", which was finished
by Master Pepero...

231995.「やはり マデサゴーラ様の芸術にあるような\n 深淵なる美が この絵には 足りな:
I still feel that this painting lacks the
profound beauty of Madesagora's art.

231997.「そうかしら？\n 私は…… 希望が感じられて 好きよ。:
Is that so? I like it... because it gives me
hope.

231999.「フハハハ！ 貴様らには まだ\n オレ様の芸術を理解できる 審美眼がないのだ！:
Hahahaha! You still don't have the aesthetic
sense to appreciate my art! But... you will
learn!

232001.「むう…… 巫女様が そうおっしゃるのなら\n 何も 言いませぬ……。:
Hmm... if the Maiden says so, then I can't
really say anything else...

232003.「……この絵は もとは じじいの作品だ。\n だから これは 通過点にすぎぬ。\:
...This painting was originally my old man's
work. That's why it's just a checkpoint. Next
time, I'll create something more my style!

232005.「そして……いつかは じじいを超える\n 魔界最高の 芸術家になってやる！\n:
And one day, I will surpass my old man and
become the greatest artist in the Demon World!
Hahahahahaha!

232007.「あッ そういえば…… 貴様らは\n ここへ 大魔王の覇印を取りにきたのだったな:
Ah, come to think of it... you guys came here
to get the Great Demon King Mark, didn't you?

232009.「どうやら 手元にあるようだが\n 持って帰って かまわんぞ。\n じじいに代わ:
It looks like you have it on hand, but you're
welcome to take it back with you. I'll allow
it on behalf of the old man!

232011.「……ペペロから あらましは 聞きました。\n おふたりのご活躍で ゴーラを覆っ:
I heard the whole story from Pepero. He told
me that the two of you were able to quell the
deep demon miasma that had covered Gora.

232013.「ひとまず ゴーラは 救われました。\n おふたりのご助力 まことに 感謝いたし:
For the time being, Gora has been saved. Thank
you both very much for your help. Please
accept this with our gratitude.

232015.「それは さておき……<pc>！\n 世話になったな。何か あったら いつでも\:
That aside...! Thanks for taking care of me. If you need anything at all, just let me know! I'm here to help you with your
artistic endeavors!

232017.「未来の偉大なる芸術家……ペペロゴーラ様がな！\n フハハハハハ！:
The great artist of the future... the great
Peperogora! Hahahahahaha!

232019.「結局 私の記憶は 戻らなかった。\n 自分が 何者なのか わからないまま……。:
In the end, my memory did not return. I still
don't know who I am.

232021.「けれど ペペロくんを見ていて\n そんなことは 重要じゃないって 気づいたの。:
But looking at Pepero, I realized that such
things are not important.

232023.「……大事なのは 私が 何をしたいか。\n 今は 私がしたいと思ったことを\n:
The important thing is what I want to do. Now
I've decided to do what I want to do, just as
I want to do it.

232027.「待っていたぞ 魔瘴の巫女。: I've been waiting for you, Maiden of Miasma.

232029.「お前に 用がある。\n 私たちと 共に 来てもらおう。: I have use for you. You will come with us.

232033.「我ら バルディスタは\n 魔瘴増加の危機に 瀕している。\n このままでは ゴ:
Valdista is in danger of experiencing an
increase in demon miasma. If we don't do
something about it, we'll end up like Gora.

232035.「だが……お前のチカラがあれば\n その危機を 取り除くことができる。\n バル:
But... with your help, we can remove the
danger. We can save Valdista from the demon
miasma.

232037.「おとなしく ついてくるなら\n 悪いようにはしない。:
If you follow quietly, no harm will come to
you.

232039.「……これは 交渉ではない。命令だ。: ...This is not a request. It's an order.

232041.「ならば やむをえん……: Then you leave me no choice...

232049.「……よう。\n どいつもこいつも 相変わらずだな。: ...Yo. You're all looking the same as always.

232051.「ユシュカ……いったい 何のつもりだ！？: Yushka... what do you think you're doing!?

232053.「<pc>。俺のしもべを やめたら\n 今度は 巫女のしもべに なったというわけ:
. So you stopped being my servant, and now you've become the Maiden's servant. You've got servitude written all over
you, don't you?

232055.「ヴァレリア…… お前の軍は\n 毎度 しのびこみやすくて 助かる。\n 相変わ:
Valeria, your army is always so easy to sneak
into. As usual, you should pay more attention.

232057.「このようなことをして\n ただで済むとは 思っていないだろうな？:
You don't expect to get away with this, do
you?

232059.「おお 怖い怖い。\n すぐに 怒りだすのも 相変わらずか。:
Oh, how scary. Do you always get angry this
easily, too?

232061.「……魔瘴の巫女は この俺が もらった。\n 返してほしくば ファラザードの城ま:
...The Maiden of Miasma is mine. If you want
her back, come to Farazard Castle.

232063.「来られるものならな。: If you can make it, that is.

232067.「バルディスタ各地の 部隊を集め\n ファラザードに 進軍するッ！:
We will gather troops from all across Valdista
and march upon Farazard!

232069.「……こりゃあ でけえ戦争になるぜェ。: ...This is gonna be a big war.

244531.「……キキッ ミタゾ ミタゾ。: ...kee hee... I saw it, I saw it!

244534.「もう 眠ってしまった？\n 起こしてしまったら ごめんなさい。:
Have you fallen asleep already? I'm sorry if I
woke you.

244535.「私……闇の中のことは 覚えていないけれど\n きっと 怖い思いをしていた。\n:
I... don't remember what I saw in the dark,
but I'm sure I was scared. I really appreciate
you freeing me from that.

244536.「まだ 何もかもが もやに包まれたまま。\n けれど あなたのそばにいれば\n:
Everything is still shrouded in darkness. But
somehow, I feel like things will go well if I
stay close to you.

244537.「……明日も 早いわ。\n ゴーラの国のみんなのため がんばりましょう。\n お:
...Tomorrow will come soon. Let's do our best
for the people of Gora. Good night...

247723.「<pc>と 一緒なら\n どんな危険な場所でも 平気よ。:
With <pc>, I can go anywhere
dangerous.

250626.「オレ……生きのびられっかなァ。: I wonder if I'll survive this...

250985.「……そうだ イルーシャ。\n じつは 貴様に 渡したいものがあるのだ。\n 後:
Oh yeah, Irusha. I have something for you.
Come to my office later.

251673.<pc>と イルーシャは\n真・魔幻宮殿のロビーに 向かった……。:
<pc> and Irusha headed for the lobby
of the True Demon Palace...

253531.……魔仙卿から <pc>に話があるようだ。\n魔仙卿に 話しかけてみよう。:
...I think the Oracle wants to talk to
<pc>. Let's talk to the Oracle.
